name: SHiBGOTCHi
description: SHiBGOTCHi is a deflationary & stackable token running on the ERC-20 chain. We aim to bring the cult-game Tamagotchi into web3 and the Metaverse. Shibgotchi was created by our love of Memes, NFTs, Gamefi, and the cult game Tamagotchi. Everything combined blends into SHiBGOTCHi, the biggest retro Gamefi token in the Metaverse. Explore the retro world with over 10.000 NFTs to individualize your very own SHiBGOTCHi.
